name: prompttracker
description: AI-powered brand mention analyzer with modern web interface

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
